text: The Bonnaroo Music and Arts Festival is an annual four-day music festival held in Manchester, Tennessee. It is held by Superfly Productions and AC Entertainment. It was first put together in 2002. The show's main features are the multiple stages. The two main stages—the "What" stage and the "Which" stage—provide most of the performances. The music that is heard comes in a wide variety, including world music, hip hop, jazz, americana, bluegrass, country music, folk, gospel, reggae, electronica, and other alternative music. There was no festival in 2020 because of COVID-19 pandemic. Category:Music festivals in the United States Category:Tennessee Category:2002 establishments in the United States Category:2000s establishments in Tennessee
title: Bonnaroo Music Festival
